description: This Dart source file implements an in-memory data source for a fleet management system. The class `MemoryDataSource` provides methods to initialize, retrieve, create, update, and delete vehicles, groups, and maintenance events, all stored in in-memory lists. It is mainly intended for testing and demo purposes, matching the interface `DataSource` to allow swapping with other implementations.

classes.name: MemoryDataSource
classes.description: An in-memory implementation of the DataSource interface, managing lists of vehicles, groups, and events for a fleet management system.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Populates the in-memory lists with default data if they are empty, setting up initial groups, vehicles, and events.

methods.name: getVehicles
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of all stored vehicles.

methods.name: createVehicle
methods.description: Adds a new vehicle to the in-memory list.

methods.name: updateVehicle
methods.description: Updates an existing vehicle with new details.

methods.name: deleteVehicle
methods.description: Removes a vehicle from the list by ID.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of all groups.

methods.name: createGroup
methods.description: Adds a new group to the in-memory list.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of all maintenance events.
